actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 9 (2d6 + 2 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (2d4 + 2 damage) slashing damage. If the target is a creature other than an elf or undead, it must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
